# caption()

**Instance Method**

Returns the text of the label on a push button control.

## Declaration

```swift
func caption() -> String!
```

## Return Value

The label drawn on a push button control.

## Discussion

This method applies only to the label drawn on a control of type [doc://com.apple.pdfkit/documentation/PDFKit/PDFAnnotationButtonWidget].

## Related Documentation

- **PDFAnnotationButtonWidget**: A `PDFAnnotationButtonWidget` object provides user interactivity on a page of a PDF document. There are three types of buttons available: push button, radio button, and checkbox.

## Getting and Setting the Control Label Text

- **setCaption(_:)**: Sets the text of the label on a push button control.
